#include <iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t,n,max;
	char a[100001];
	cin>>t;
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
	   cin>>a;
	   long int cnt=0,cnt2=0,cnt3=0;
	   for(long int j=0;a[j]!='\0';j++){
	       if(a[j]=='T')
	       cnt++;
	       else
	       cnt2++;
	       if(cnt2>cnt)
	       {cnt3++;
	       break;
	       }
	   }
	   if(cnt3==0){
	   if(cnt==cnt2)
	   cout<<"YES"<<endl;	
	    else
	    cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	   }
	   else
	   cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
